name: Mountain Crusher
desc:
You swing your weapon and strike the earth, creating a massive rupture that covers a 60 foot cone. Any object fully within the area is utterly destroyed, while all creatures within must make a Strength saving throw or take 8d8 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The area becomes difficult terrain.

If a solid surface, such as a cave wall, is struck, the spell carves out a stable tunnel 10 feet tall, 15 feet wide, and 90 feet long.
